content: this is a summary of a legal text about a case in the district court in ljubljana the case is identified as settlement p 13112014 and the document is dated august 26 2014 the text explains the progress of the case which started on may 28 2014 and ended on august 26 2014 lasting for a total of 2 months and 29 days the final resolution involves dividing goods and real estate between the plaintiff and the defendant the value of the goods is 37500 eur the real estate will be divided equally with each party receiving half the court made a decision based on legal principles the details of the settlement reached in court are confidential and there is no translation available

metadata.CASE_ID: Okrožno sodišče v Ljubljani, settlement P 1311/2014 – I, 26.8.2014
metadata.cost: Costs: Each party bears their own costs
